vote.explanation: The aligener panel adjust positions and fontsize. If the "use global aligners" box is checked the panel adjusts global aligners for all a scenes that has the box checked. If it is not checked, the panel only adjusts local aligners for this scene.
vote.headline: Global/local timer is for the scene. If the subscene has the box "use global timer" checked it aligns with the scenes timer. Else it only adjusts timer for the individual subscene.

question.headline: Global/local timer is for the scene. If the subscene has the box "use global timer" checked it aligns with the scenes timer. Else it only adjusts timer for the individual subscene.
question.q: The images are chosen for each answer option, row 1 is the image for answer option 1...
